thread.title: BRIEF-Saudi British Bank Q4 Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Saudi British Bank Q4 Profit Rises

organizations.name: brief-saudi british bank q4 profit rises feb

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - SAUDI BRITISH BANK:
* Q4 NET PROFIT 706 MILLION RIYALS VERSUS 607 MILLION RIYALS YEAR AGO
* AS OF END-DEC 2017, LOAN AND ADVANCES STAND AT 117.01 BILLION RIYALS, DOWN 3.27 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR
* AS OF END-DEC 2017, CUSTOMER DEPOSITS STAND AT 140.24 BILLION RIYALS, DOWN 0.28 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: )
